subject: Proposal for Q4 Marketing Analytics Platform
body:
Dear Alex,

Thank you for taking the time to meet with our team last week. As discussed, I'm attaching our comprehensive proposal for implementing our marketing analytics platform for Q4.

Key highlights include:
- 25% improvement in campaign ROI tracking
- Real-time dashboard integration
- Comprehensive training package
- 24/7 technical support

The total investment would be $45,000 with implementation starting October 1st. I'm available for a follow-up call this week to address any questions.

Best regards,
Michael Johnson
Senior Sales Manager
